name: borderlinx.com
overview:
Borderlinx is a leader in cross-border e-commerce with 2 business lines :

  1. Cross border e-commerce service for end-users

Borderlinx.com is revolutionising the way people shop around the world by providing the freedom to purchase from any website using your very own US or UK shipping address. We deliver excellent package delivery by linking borders and breaking down boundaries for shoppers all over the world with consolidation and repacking services.

  1. Cross border e-commerce solutions for Enterprise :

a. Borderlinx Cross Border API is leveraging our Tax & Duties tool, logistic operations and buying power. We give the ability to e-retailers to then calculate shipping, tax and duties on their platform, collect them up front and deliver a Delivery Duty Paid service.

b. OneWorldAvenue is a curated fashion/lifestyle market place acting as a cross border flagship for Brands and generate incremental sales by targeting emerging markets. We address the critical questions on the minds of many e-­commerce marketers who want to take their global sales strategy to the next level. We provide an end-­to­‐end solution generating international parcels, and driving customer loyalty and repeat usage via intelligence based marketing

Our strategic partners are MasterCard, Visa, American Express, Alipay and DHL Express.

Specialties Global Ecommerce, Performance Based Marketing, Cross-Border Trade, International Shipping
